steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Place the cursor where you want to create the bulleted list.
Click on the 'Bulleted List' button in the 'Paragraph' section of the 'Home' tab.
Type the first item of the bulleted list.
Press 'Enter' to create a new bullet point and continue typing the next item.
Repeat the previous step for each item in the list.
To end the bulleted list, press 'Enter' twice.
